Title: The Passion of the Christ
Overview: A graphic portrayal of the last twelve hours of Jesus of Nazareth's life.
Tagline: By his wounds, we were healed.
Keywords: christianity, jewry, roman empire, jesus christ, suffering, apostle, last supper, roman, bible, mission, torture
production_companies: Icon Productions, Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation
Cast: Jim Caviezel, Maia Morgenstern, Monica Bellucci
